hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Goron Tunic#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #the Song of Storms#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Temple of Time# is on the path to #the Tower#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that Twinrova always casts the same spell the first three times.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Bombchu Shop#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: @ tries to read the Gossip Stone...^${12 48 06}but he's standing on the wrong side of it!

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Goron Tunic#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #cow behind webs# in a grotto gifts #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #the Light Arrows#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Underwater Front Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# and #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #a Slingshot# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Lon Lon Ranch# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Carpenters' tent#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #Deku Nut Capacity# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 3 Bottom

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #3# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##Zora's River## has #4# major items.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #2# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: Did you know that you only need to play the Song of Time to open the Door of Time? The Spiritual Stones are not needed.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #Twinrova#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Right Central Chest

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Megaton Hammer#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Megaton Hammer#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Big Lava Room Blocked Door Chest

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a hero ventures #beyond the wasteland# to learn #a Forest Temple Small Key#.
